verbs.description: Many families of the 17 students and adults who [V: were] killed in the horrific school shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland , Florida , say they still have n’t heard from Donald Trump .

Many families of [ARG1: the 17 students and adults] [R-ARG1: who] were [V: killed] [ARG2: in the horrific school shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland , Florida] , say they still have n’t heard from Donald Trump .
